text: Autobahn is a German loanword for controlled-access highways. An autobahn is for fast travel by road vehicles. == Word == The word contains , and . In English, autobahn means a highway especially in a German-speaking country. This means Germany and Austria, and usually also Switzerland. In German, however, means a highway anywhere in the world. == Networks == * in Austria * in Germany * Autobahn in Switzerland == Sources == == Other websites == * Autobahn-Bilder.de â€“ pictures of highways (not limited to autobahns) Category:Roads Category:Transport in Germany Category:Transport in Austria Category:Transport in Switzerland
title: Autobahn
